subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Petty got back into a race last weekend, when he qualified the No. 45 car at Talladega Superspeedway for its first event in nearly a month.
snippet: Kyle Petty got back into a race last weekend, when he qualified the No. 45 car at Talladega Superspeedway for its first event in nearly a month.
